code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import api from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ManageSpecializations=()=>{const[items,setItems]=useState([]);const[name,setName]=useState('');const fetchItems=async()=>{try{const res=await api.get('/specializations');setItems(res.data.data.specializations);}catch(err){console.error(err);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchItems();},[]);const add=async()=>{try{await api.post('/specializations',{name});setName('');fetchItems();}catch(err){console.error(err);alert('Error adding');}};const del=async id=>{if(!confirm('Delete?'))return;try{await api.delete("/specializations/".concat(id));fetchItems();}catch(err){console.error(err);alert('Error deleting');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container admin-dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Specializations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-compact",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"New Specialization"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"form-control",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:add,children:"Add"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:items.map(i=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[i.name," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"action-btn delete",onClick:()=>del(i._id),children:"Delete"})]},i._id))})]})]});};export default ManageSpecializations;
